entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -26.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 22 except minus 26 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22 except minus 26 inland. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
